• Experience with 3 or more aspects of our tech stack (Python, Kotlin, Javascript/TypeScript, Postgres, AWS, GraphQL, DataDog, Docker, Kubernetes).
• Experience with scaling services, performance
• Passion for reliable, scalable, observable software with a strong sense of ownership.
• Capacity to work in high growth, fast-paced environments, and can adapt to change.
• Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
• Excellent time management skills.
• Ability to empathize with customers, stakeholders, and other engineers.
• Acute attention to detail and dedication to quality.

• Enjoy tech talks, katas, lunch and learns, and geeking over programming languages, architecture, category theory, or whatever engineering topic you are passionate about.
• Experience working within e-commerce and third-party payment gateways.
• Attend meetups, conferences, and participate in the software engineering community.
• Contribute to open-source projects.
• Experience migrating a monolithic system to an ecosystem of microservices.
• Have tried Test-Driven Development (TDD).
• Experience with or knowledge of DDD, CQRS and Event Sourcing.
• Enjoy talking to product, design, and business stakeholders to better understand the problem space.
• Worked on a system that had to deal with internationalization and localization.

As a Senior Software Engineer - Tech Lead Manager, you will:

Discover is one of the products in SigFig’s ecosystem and this is the team that is squarely focused on it. Think of Discover like a “digital financial doctor”. If you’re thinking this is a lot, it is! That’s why we work in an empowered product model. The team consists of engineers, product designers, & product managers working as peers focused on driving outcomes. Our motto is “minimize outputs, maximize impact.”
